div.style: background:#FFF; border:thin; border-color:#060; width:100%; text-align:left; index=1000;

blockquote.p: Please use these links to view information regarding updates related to the Corona Virus (COVID-19) and Houghton Lake Community Schools.
To request a food delivery, please send an email to HLCSFoodRequest@hlcsk12.net.
HLCS Administrative Center Hours March 30 - April 3

p.a: COVID update letter to Parents/Guardians and Community Members

br.p: About Us | Driving Directions | Contact Us
6001 W. Houghton Lake Drive, Houghton Lake, MI 48629 | Phone 989-366-2035 | Fax 989-422-6606
